HOME_SUBTITLE: Senior Full stack Developer • Tech Lead • Systems Analyst
ABOUT_DESC_1: Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of professional experience and a self-taught development background of over 10 years through personal projects, designing, evolving, and modernizing critical web and mobile applications for multiple companies and thousands of users. Results-driven, with a strong focus on code quality, operational efficiency, and continuous improvement.
ABOUT_DESC_2: Expert in Angular (JS and 2+ up to v20), React, Node.js, PHP, Ionic, Cloud (Azure and Cloudflare R2), and CI/CD, with a proven track record in technology migrations, legacy system modernization, and deployment automation. Strong knowledge of MySQL and relational database design and normalization.
ABOUT_DESC_3: Technical team leadership, architecture definition, demand prioritization, and cross-functional coordination with DevOps, QA, and Support, ensuring high availability (>95%) and a 50% reduction in recurring production incidents.
ABOUT_DESC_4: Academic background and languages: Systems Analyst graduated in 2020 with an academic average of 8/10. Native Spanish speaker, with advanced Portuguese for professional technical use and intermediate English.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_1: I led a full stack team of 3 developers in the maintenance and evolution of 2 web applications, 5 mobile apps, and 5 APIs, used by 40 clients and thousands of users, ensuring sustained availability >95%.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_2: I defined the technical strategy, prioritized initiatives, and coordinated cross-functionally with DevOps, QA, and Support, accelerating incident resolution and optimizing delivery processes.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_3: I designed and executed the migration of storage from Azure Blob Storage to Cloudflare R2, achieving a 50% reduction in traffic costs with no impact on production.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_4: I led the technological modernization of mobile applications by migrating from Ionic 3 to Ionic 8, including refactoring and dependency updates, improving the platform’s maintainability and extensibility.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_5: I implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time from up to 1 hour to 5 minutes and increasing the release frequency to 4–6 per month.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_6: I automated build and distribution processes in Firebase and app stores, reducing build generation time from half a day to 5 minutes and eliminating configuration errors.
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_RESPONSIBILITY_7: I supervised code quality, security, and performance through code reviews and dependency management, contributing to 50% fewer recurring incidents.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_RESPONSIBILITY_1: I maintained and evolved full stack functionalities in ReactJS, PHP, and JavaScript, delivering an average of 10 features and bug fixes per 2-week sprint for 40 clients and thousands of users.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_RESPONSIBILITY_2: I participated in the definition of technical architecture and solution design, optimizing the scalability and maintainability of legacy systems and new products.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_RESPONSIBILITY_3: I modernized legacy systems through component refactoring and modularization, achieving a 60% reduction in codebase size.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_RESPONSIBILITY_4: I maintained 5 hybrid mobile applications with Ionic, integrating native plugins and Android/iOS support, ensuring consistency across devices and environments.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_RESPONSIBILITY_5: I implemented an offline-first architecture with data synchronization, enabling continuous operation in environments without connectivity.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_RESPONSIBILITY_6: I managed file storage in Azure Blob Storage, optimizing efficiency and reducing complexity in data access.
APEX_FRONTEND_RESPONSIBILITY_1: I maintained dynamic interfaces with AngularJS, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, ensuring a consistent user experience and cross-browser compatibility in high-volume applications.
APEX_FRONTEND_RESPONSIBILITY_2: I implemented client-configurable conversational flows within a multi-tenant architecture, enabling quick and customized adaptations for multiple clients.
APEX_FRONTEND_RESPONSIBILITY_3: I collaborated in debugging and resolving critical incidents, contributing to the product’s stability and operational continuity.
APEX_FRONTEND_RESPONSIBILITY_4: I participated in code reviews and promoted front-end development best practices, improving code quality and facilitating product evolution.
PROJECT_AUTODRIVE_STACK: Angular, WebSockets, Cloudinary, ORM (models/associations), JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, Express, i18n.
PROJECT_AUTODRIVE_DESC: Full-scale project integrating a Node.js RESTful backend with a modular structure (controllers, models, routes) and an Angular frontend featuring routes, services, and views for dashboard and authentication. It supports image uploading and storage via Cloudinary and file management, real-time notifications with socket.js, and localization using en-US.json, es-ES.json, and pt-BR.json files. The database is organized through models and associations; the code includes mailing and logging utilities for onboarding and recovery flows. Designed for production with config separation (config.env) and a clear structure for maintenance and scalability.
PROJECT_OILGROUP_STACK: Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, HTML/CSS/SCSS, Handlebars/HTML templates for reports, mailing modules, and PDF generation.
PROJECT_OILGROUP_DESC: Full-stack web application for managing sales, purchases, inventory, and reports, tailored for distributors (OilGroup). Featuring an Angular interface and a Node.js/Express backend with PDF generation and email delivery capabilities.
PROJECT_OILGROUP_RESULT: Centralizes commercial operations and reporting, saves time through automated ticket and report generation, and facilitates inventory control and billing.
PROJECT_ANGULARJSONFORM_DESC: Angular library that allows form definition via JSON, automatically rendering them with validation, various input types (text, number, file, date, color, radio, checkbox, select, etc.), and customizable styles. It streamlines the rapid creation of form-based UIs without writing repetitive templates.
PROJECT_ANGULARJSONFORM_RESULT: Reduces form creation time and improves UI consistency; exportable as a reusable component for multiple projects.
